positive_examples: This is an example of science museum.
The science museum demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed science museum in this context.
A typical case of science museum would involve these features.
The concept of science museum applies here.
A museum dedicated to science and technology exhibits, often featuring interactive displays and scientific instruments.
negative_examples: This is an example of art museum, not science museum.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: ArtMuseum, or other types of Museum

definition: An institution dedicated to exhibiting scientific knowledge, discoveries, and technological artifacts.
